translations: 愚弄；干傻事；戏谑；沾花惹草（fool 的过去式及过去分词）

phrs.translation: 愚人节；愚人节中受愚弄者
闲荡；游手好闲；干无用的事
聪明人；绝不是傻瓜；精明机敏
与不三不四的人鬼混（等于fool about with）

sentences.sentence: He masqueraded as a doctor and fooled everyone.
sentences.translation: 他冒充医生，骗过了每一个人。

sentences.sentence: She certainly had me fooled —I really believed her!
sentences.translation: 她确实把我骗了—我真的相信了她的话！

sentences.sentence: Books are history! But don't be fooled.
sentences.translation: 书是历史！但是不要被愚弄了。
